attributes.action: Petition to create definitive legistaltion regarding maximum temperature in a working environment.
attributes.additional_details:
We want to petition the Government to create legislation that will enforce a maximum working temperature of 26-30 degrees centigrade in offices around the UK.

We already have a minimum temperature where workers have the legal right to walk out. As the effect of heat can be more dangerous than colder working conditions, we would like to see an maximum set also.
